landing.features.discover.desc: Find internships tailored to your skills and interests from top companies worldwide.

landing.features.track.desc: Keep track of all your applications in one place with status updates and reminders.

landing.features.analytics.desc: Get insights into your application performance and improve your success rate.
landing.features.community.title: Community Support
landing.features.community.desc: Connect with fellow students and get advice from experienced professionals.
